message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start!
I'll wait for a better deal. 50-50 is not as attractive as it sounds.
You said 50-50 wasn't good enough, so I'll give you a bit more. Take it or leave it!
I'll give you a bit more, but I still want a better deal. This is my last offer for now!
I'll wait for a better deal. You said it was your last offer, but I'm not convinced it's the best you can do.
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not getting any younger! Take it or leave it!
I'm not giving up yet! I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
I think this is a fair deal, and I'm willing to take it. You've been a tough negotiator, Bob!
